mapper.select: insert into technology ( technology_id, technology_name, price, vital_process_period, standard_capacity, overtime_standard_capacity, overtime_overfulfil_capacity, double_capacity, overfulfil_capacity ) values ( #{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technologyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vitalProcessPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtimeStandardCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtimeOverfulfilCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doubleCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overfulfilCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER})
